rationale: This table disaggregates revenue by detailed product and service lines such as Server products and cloud services, Microsoft 365 Commercial products and cloud services, Gaming, LinkedIn, Windows and Devices, Search and news advertising, Dynamics products and cloud services, Enterprise and partner services, Microsoft 365 Consumer products and cloud services, and Other. It includes a Total revenue row and covers recent fiscal years (2023-2025). The dimension inferred is product/service, which is preferred over segment-level tables for granularity.
